subject: new mapping proposal
msgSnippet: I see key mappings are currently being discussed again. Coincidently I have just created a new mapping. The design goal of my mapping was for text to be
messageBody:
I see key mappings are currently being discussed again. Coincidently
I have just created a new mapping. The design goal of my mapping was
for text to be readable when viewed without a quickscript font. Eg:
when websurfers view a page that is written with quikscript but
don't have the appropriate QS font can still attempt to read the
page when their browser defaults to an english font. Consequently it
tries to use mappings that most readers are used to eg: 'y' key maps
to 'ye', and 'j' maps to 'jay'.
I welcome any feedback coments to improve my mapping.

An example using my mapping: (The text is a passage from a wikipedia
entry about parachutes. It is written using general australian but
with rhotic-Rs):
-----------
DÈE 3-riN rèlÈEs sistèm iz à paràSUt kumpOnènt Dat iz wIdlEÈ yUzd bI
spört skIdIvèrz tU àtaC DÈE tU rIzèrz ov à mAÈn paràSUt tU DÈE
hRrnus Dat bers DÈE lOd undèr DÈE paràSUt.

inventèd bI .bil bUT, DÈE TrÈE-riN sistèm àlHz à skIdIvèr tU kwiklEÈ
kut-àwAÈ à malfunkSUniN mAÈn paràSUt wiT à siNgul mOSun. skIdIvèrz
yUZàlEÈ nÈEd tU dU Dis kwiklEÈ dyUriN èmèrjènsÈEz in wiC DAÈ nÈEd tU
dèplq à rèzèrv paràSUt. DÈE TrÈE-riN sistèm iz simpul, inèkspensiv,
rèlIàbul, and rèkwIrz les fizikàl förs Dan uDèr paràSUt rèlÈEs
sistèms.

DÈE lRrj botum riN iz sekyUrlEÈ àtaCt tU DÈE hRrnus wiC bers DÈE
skIdIvèrz wAÈt, and iz kunektèd dIrektlEÈ tU DÈE rIzèr bI DÈE midl
riN and rIzèr kloT, wiC iz in turn held bI à smöl riN and rIzèr
kloT. DÈE smöl riN iz sèkyUàrd bI à körd lUp, TrU wiC à kAÈbul runz
hOldiN DÈE hOl àsemblEÈ in plAÈs. rèlÈEsiN DÈE körd lUp bI rèmUviN
DÈE kAÈbul wiT à tug közuz DÈE TrÈE-riN sistèm tU kaskAÈd frÈE and
kwiklEÈ diskunekt DÈE rIzèr from DÈE hRrnus.

ÈEC riN in DÈE siàriz multèplIz DÈE mèkanikàl àdvantij ov DÈE lUp ov
körd Dat iz held in plAÈs bI DÈE semÈE-rijud kAÈbul (à .lolon-ef or
teflon kOtèd stÈEl kAÈbul, dèpendiN on manyUfakCurèr).
-----------------------

When compared against the QS-sampa mapping I believe that is an
improvement in readability for everyday readers.

This is the same text as above but using the QS-sampa mapping:
----------
Di 3-rIN rylis sIstym Iz y parySut kymponynt Dat Iz wYdli juzd bY
spOrt skYdYvyrz tu ytac Di tu rYzyrz Qv y men parySut tu Di hArnys
Dat bErs Di lod yndyr Di parySut.

InvEntyd bY .bIl buT, Di Tri-rIN sIstym ylHz y skYdYvyr tu kwIkli
kyt-ywe y malfynkSunIN men parySut wIT y sINgyl moSyn. skYdYvyrz
juZyli nid tu du DIs kwIkli djurIN ymyrJynsiz In wIc De nid tu dyplR
y ryzyrv parySut. Di Tri-rIN sIstym Iz sImpyl, InykspEnsIv,
rylYybyl, and rykwYrz lEs fIzIkyl fOrs Dan yDyr parySut rylis
sIstyms.

Di lArJ bQtym rIN Iz sEkjurli ytact tu Di hArnys wIc bErs Di
skYdYvyrz wet, and Iz kynEktyd dYrEktli tu Di rYzyr bY Di mIdl rIN
and rYzyr klQT, wIc Iz In tyrn hEld bY y smOl rIN and rYzyr klQT. Di
smOl rIN Iz sykjuyrd bY y kOrd lup, Tru wIc y kebyl rynz holdIN Di
hol ysEmbli In ples. rylisIN Di kOrd lup bY rymuvIN Di kebyl wIT y
tyg kOzyz Di Tri-rIN sIstym tu kasked fri and kwIkli dIskynEkt Di
rYzyr frQm Di hArnys.

ic rIN In Di sIyrIz myltyplYz Di mykanIkyl ydvantIJ Qv Di lup Qv
kOrd Dat Iz hEld In ples bY Di sEmi-rIjyd kebyl oy .lQlQn-Ef Qr
tEflQn kotyd stil kebyl, dypEndIN Qn manjufakcyryrU.
-----------------------


The mapping is:

pea <-> p

bay <-> y

tea <-> t

day <-> d

key <-> k

gay <-> g

thaw <-> T

they <-> D

fee <-> f

vie <-> v

see <-> s

zoo <-> z

she <-> S

j'ai <-> Z

cheer <-> C

jay <-> j

ye <-> y

way <-> w

he <-> h

why <-> W

ing <-> N

may <-> m

no <-> n

low <-> l

roe <-> r

it <-> i

eat <-> E

et <-> e

eight <-> A

at <-> a

I <-> I

ah <-> R

awe <-> Q : alternative- ö

ox <-> o

oy <-> q

utter <-> u : alternatives- à è

out <-> H

owe <-> O

foot <-> V

ooze <-> U

null (ie: no character) <-> È

Note 1 : I assume that it is possible to map a key to a nothing,
specifically: 'È' maps to a null character. Is it possible to do
this?
Note 2 : For 'utter' there are multiple mappings. The primary one
to use is 'u' but if you need to improve the english font
readability you may use either 'à' or 'è' so that the word being
typed looks similar to the TO spelling.
Note 3 : For 'awe' there is an alternate mapping. The primary one
to use is 'Q' but use 'ö' to when wishing to improve english font
readability.
